name: Through the Dice Tower
description:
Welcome to the Dice Tower!

The cheating Prince, was turned into a die by a Wicked Game Master....Now he must try and escape the Diabolical Dice Tower. Can you help him find redemption?

Through the Dice Tower is an Physics based puzzle dungeon crawler. Pick up the Prince and toss him around (using your mouse) to reach the exit in one piece. However... for each result the Prince rolls (with his head) he might trigger traps, obstacles and other effects! Each floor can have different effects as shown in the bottom right corner.

Push your luck and get the highest score possible! Good luck!

Tip: You can drag the camera around by holding down MMB, and look around with RMB.

Created for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam, theme "Roll of the Dice". Made in 48hrs by Roy Nathan de Groot (@RoyNdeGroot) and Lex van den Berg (@CherryNuggetGMS)
